'''Chanson of Many Waters''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Endless Solo of Solitude" [[Furina]] ({{Hydro}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

==History==
{{Wish History Table|Chanson of Many Waters}}

==Trivia==
* All occurrences of this Wish Series have run alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Splendor of Tranquil Waters]], a weapon tailored to Furina's gameplay mechanics.
